subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Samuel Peter survived three early knockdowns Saturday night to win the World Boxing Council title, outpointing Jameel McCline at Madison Square Garden. His next opponent may be Oleg Maskaev, who withdrew from the bout with a back injury.
snippet: Samuel Peter survived three early knockdowns Saturday night to win the World Boxing Council title, outpointing Jameel McCline at Madison Square Garden. His next opponent may be Oleg Maskaev, who withdrew from the bout with a back injury.
